LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag.label: frag LGIS tube
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag.description: Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher, but it is also used to feed various LGIS launchers.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag.tools.2.label: muzzle

LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag_ID.label: indirect frag LGIS launcher
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag_ID.description: Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher, but you need to retract the sights, switch it to direct fire mode for it to be used in other launchers as ammunition.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag_ID.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag_ID.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LGIS_frag_ID.tools.2.label: muzzle
